Name: Biggles Sidecar
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of fresh ginger and lemon slices..
Garnish with fresh ginger and lemon slices.
Review: The idea was to make a riff on an Aviation (see Biggles Aviation ) but ginger cries out for cognac so I also ended up with this ginger Sidecar .
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England. As a kid, I was an avid reader of the Biggles books.
Nutrition: One serving of Biggles Sidecar contains 186 calories
